changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO transaction_type (id, name_ml) VALUES ('0001', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Add Balance', 'ru', 'Add Balance')), ('0002', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Create Artwork', 'ru', 'Create Artwork')), ('0003', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Bid', 'ru', 'Bid')), ('0004', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Ask', 'ru', 'Ask')), ('0005', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Buy/Sell', 'ru', 'Buy/Sell')), ('0006', JSON_OBJECT('en', 'Cancel Bid', 'ru', 'Cancel Bid'));
